content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in München, let me begin with an initial proposal of 1250 Euros per month. Keep in mind that this premium location and modern amenities come at a high value. If you find this price acceptable, I agree to the price of 1250 Euro! However, if you wish to negotiate further, please do let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your straightforwardness. I am willing to pay 1000 Euro per month. Given the location and amenities, I believe this is a fair price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this apartment in this prime location is higher than your offered price of 1000 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
